pageTitle: Pietro Mechetti - IMSLP/Petrucci Music Library: Free Public Domain Sheet Music
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {490=The Mechetti company had been in operation since 1798 and had gained prominence with first editions of works by Chopin, Mendelssohn, Nicolai, Schumann, Schubert, and Johann Strauss Junior, among others. The firm was sold to Diabelli in 1855.}
textBeforeTable: Dates in brackets are estimated. Most plate numbers include the prefix: "P.M. No." Plate Numbers The Mechetti company had been in operation since 1798 and had gained prominence with first editions of works by Chopin, Mendelssohn, Nicolai, Schumann, Schubert, and Johann Strauss Junior, among others. The firm was sold to Diabelli in 1855.
